text: I just finished my art class with Emma during my vacation in Singapore. I am from Germany and Emma’s art class was recommended to me by a friend’s friend. I am so happy that I signed up for drawing & painting class at this studio! I learned so much and I was able to complete my first acrylic painting! The course made me feel very proud of myself and it was honestly so much fun! Emma is a very skilled artist. Thank you so much!

I’ve been coming to Teacher Emma’s class for the past few years and I love her classes. In her class, you can relax and enjoy your time painting. It’s a very cozy and comfortable environment. Pls check out 1 Art place when you have free time!
An extremely professional outfit, with top of the line customer service that focuses on what the customer needs rather than their own agenda. Patience and transparency. Top job!
Great place for art lessons! Teacher is talented, friendly and approachable. Would definitely recommend this place :D

The teacher is quite nice
:D
In my opinion it is a good place for learning art
